scripts.test: HAIBUN_ENV=fromenv=passed HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_HEADLESS=true HAIBUN_O_OUTJUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_KEY=test HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS haibun-cli tests
scripts.test-no-monitor: HAIBUN_ENV=fromenv=passed HAIBUN_O_OUTJUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_KEY=test HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_CAPTURE_VIDEO=true haibun-cli tests
scripts.test-debug: HAIBUN_ENV=fromenv=passed HAIBUN_O_OUTJUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each haibun-cli -c tests/config-debug.json tests
scripts.test-debug-mcp: HAIBUN_ENV=fromenv=passed HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_LISTEN_PORT=${HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_LISTEN_PORT:-8125} HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_ACCESS_TOKEN=${HAIBUN_O_HTTPEXECUTORSTEPPER_ACCESS_TOKEN:-localTest} HAIBUN_O_OUTJUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each haibun-cli -c tests/config-debug-mcp.json tests
scripts.test-narrator: HAIBUN_ENV=fromenv=passed HAIBUN_O_OUTJUNIT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_A11YSTEPPER_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_STORAGE=StorageFS HAIBUN_O_WEBPLAYWRIGHT_MONITOR=each haibun-cli -c tests/config-narrator.json tests
